name: 机忆
description:
Disclaimer: all characters in the game are over 18 years old. All characters are over 18 years old, as indicated in the opening chart.


Introduction:


This is a text adventure game based on cyberpunk world.



Players will play a cartoonist who is engaged in robot cartoon drawing, and interact with maid robot through options, so as to achieve different game outcomes.



Background:



This is the era of robots and the gradual disappearance of the concept of "human".



The bionic robot created by the new technological revolution has blurred the boundary between human and robot, and has the intelligence no less than human. Because of its low cost and high efficiency, it has been rapidly applied to various industries, promoting economic development.



With more and more social fields in which robots participate, people's excitement about intelligent robots has gradually turned into fear and confusion. A large number of people are unemployed and can't be placed, and robot related crimes occur frequently. The original ethical order based on traditional human society has also collapsed. The government introduced the robot Management Act, using electronic collars to conduct unified management and monitoring of robots, and established the AI supervision department. But all these measures are struggling under the capital pressure of robot manufacturing companies.



In the world of cyberpunk, where robots are pushed to the forefront of the wave, the third-class cartoonist who was rejected because of the dissimilarity of robot painting bought an unidentified maid robot as a reference for his cartoon.




matters needing attention:
